item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1644; 09:48PM; 6951 N Corbin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KQNr4Z; Winnetka; Firefighters engaged in an aggressive attack, with interior fire attack and rooftop ventilation, against flames consuming the 1,194 sq-ft home built in 1924. One occupant was found with burns and transported to a local hospital. It took 35 firefighters just 16 minutes to extinguish the flames. Red Cross was notified to assist with approximately five residents who will be displaced. The cause of the fire is under investigation. LAPD Inc # 5025.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 BC17 CM42 E104 E273 E293 E305 E472 E73 E93 EM17 RA104 RA72 RA73 T105 T73 T93; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1644; 09:32PM; 7000 N Corbin Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KQj6Dt; Reseda; PRELIM: One-story single-family home with fire showing. Offensive mode.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC17 E104 E273 E293 E472 E93 RA104 RA72 T73 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1016; 03:20PM; 7357 N Loma Verde Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CVB70v; Canoga Park; Firefighters found heavy fire coming from a one-story single-family home, which had spread to one neighboring home (and minor damage to a detached garage). The incident commander requested additional units and divided the fire ground crews into groups to attack all burning structures simultaneously. Ultimately, it took 39 firefighters 31 minutes to eliminate all threat of fire in the area. Although there were no injuries, sadly, one family canine perished in the blaze. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 E104 E105 E273 E296 E305 E472 EM17 RA72 RA872 RA93 T105 T73 T96; CH8; 18; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1016; 02:49PM; 7357 N Loma Verde Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3CVB70v; Canoga Park; One-story single-family home with heavy fire showing, threatening nearby structures. Offensive mode.; FS 72; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; BC15 E104 E296 E305 E472 RA72 RA872 T105 T96; CH9; 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0653; 11:26AM; 134 E 84th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q4CSU4; Florence; Thirty firefighters quickly knocked down the flames involving an auto and a detached garage in 13 minutes, without injury. Cause under investigation.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E57 RA33 RA833 SQ21 T33 T64; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0653; 11:13AM; 118 E 84th Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3q7N91P; Florence; Detached garage (to the rear of a single-family home) with heavy fire showing.; FS 33; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC13 E233 E264 E33 E57 RA33 RA833 T33 T64; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1805; 11:43PM; 233 S Av 52; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w417Ft; Highland Park; Firefighters found a one-story single-family home with heavy fire, and structures being threatened on three sides. Firefighters began a defensive attack (from the exterior only) and successfully defended all three adjacent structures. It took 30 firefighters 40 minutes to extinguish the flames. Sadly, one person was found inside and perished in the blaze. Age/gender/affiliation/circumstances unknown. Fire investigators, LAPD, and Coroner notified. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; AR1 BC2 E1 E12 E201 E212 E250 E44 RA12 RA844 T1 T12 T50; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1805; 11:03PM; 213 S Av 52; MAP: https://bit.ly/3KJfrHz; Highland Park; One-story single family home with heavy fire showing, and nearby structures threatened. Defensive mode.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E12 E201 E212 E44 RA12 RA844 T1 T12; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1156; 04:23PM; 1301 S Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3w6HD2Y; Boyle Heights; It took 50 firefighters 25 minutes to extinguish flames in the vacant (boarded up) structure and attic space, using interior fire attack with coordinated rooftop ventilation. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E14 E17 E2 E20 E203 E210 E211 E25 E60 EA1 RA17 RA25 T10 T11 T3; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange
